name: Wild West Shootout (ThatGuyDed)
description:
This is a simple game I have made for a university assessment where you play in a top-down shooter. You have to survive 60 seconds of enemies and then fight a boss who gets progressively harder. 

There are 2 characters you can switch between, one with a green hat - who is faster but shoots slower - and one with a brown hat - who moves slower but shoots faster.

Controls:

W- Forwards

A-Rotate Left

S- Backwards

D- Rotate Right

E- Switch character

Space- Shoot

Kieran Mode on the menu is a god mode.

Music from: https://tones.wolfram.com/generate

Sound Effects from: https://sfxr.me/
